data.comment: The match has started at World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 5, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Yoon Jong-gyu's header is off-target for Seoul.
In the minute 6, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 13, Gangwon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Gangwon needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 21, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seoul's half.
In the minute 24, Han Chan-hee gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seoul.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Han Chan-hee has recovered and rejoins the match in Seoul.
In the minute 30, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Han Chan-hee.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 31, In Seoul Seoul attack through Han Seung-gyu. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
Jeong Ji-yong for Gangwon drives towards goal at World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
Seoul are pushing forward but Jo Yeong-uk's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Jo Yeong-uk of Seoul gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gangwon have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick Gangwon.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon.
Su-Beom Kim for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
Goal kick for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 37, The match at World Cup Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kim Won-sik, who is down injured.
Kim Won-sik is back on his feet again.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 41, Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
In Seoul, Yun Ju-tae of Seoul is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 42, Seoul's Han Seung-gyu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Gangwon at World Cup Stadium.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
In the minute 43, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yong-woo Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Seoul in Seoul.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Seoul.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at World Cup Stadium.
The second-half is underway at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul are coming forward and Han Seung-gyu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Lee Yeong-jae is replacing Cho Ji-hun for the away team.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 48, Free kick Gangwon.
Yong-woo Kim signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Seoul's area.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Gangwon's Ko Mu-yeol gets in a shot on goal at World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Gangwon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seoul's half?
Seoul have a goal kick.
Gangwon drives forward and Ko Mu-yeol gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Gangwon pushes forward through Lee Yeong-jae, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Jo Yeong-uk (Seoul) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Gangwon.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 59, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Gangwon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gangwon's Lee Jae-kwon misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 60, Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Seoul.
The home team replace Han Chan-hee with Kwon Seong-yun.
In the minute 63, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon.
Gangwon's Jeong Ji-yong misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 64, Can Seoul capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
At World Cup Stadium, Kim Yeong-bin has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 66, Kim Seung-dae (Gangwon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 67, Gangwon's Kim Kyung-jung breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Hyeok-sun Park is making the team's second substitution at World Cup Stadium with Park Chu-young replacing Yun Ju-tae.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Seoul in Seoul.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seoul are in shooting range from this free kick.
The away team have replaced Jeong Ji-yong with Chae Gwang-hoon. This is the second substitution made today by Byung-Soo Kim.
In the minute 70, Goal! Park Chu-young gives Seoul a 1-0 lead in Seoul.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gangwon territory.
In the minute 76, Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk is on target but unsuccessful.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 78, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 80, Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seoul's half.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Ko Mu-yeol.
Great play from Lee Jae-kwon to set up the goal.
In the minute 82, Yong-woo Kim blows against Seoul's Kwon Seong-yun for offside.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Seoul advance rapidly upfield but Yong-woo Kim blows for offside.
In the minute 83, Se Jong Ju for Seoul has been booked by Yong-woo Kim and receives a first yellow card.
Osmar Barba is replacing Han Seung-gyu for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Important block from the Gangwon defence as Kim Jin-ya fires in a strike for Seoul.
Seo Min-woo is on a sub for Kim Kyung-jung for Gangwon.
In the minute 87, Seoul have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seoul's half.
Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 89, Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gangwon.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Seoul.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Gangwon awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Seoul, Seoul push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
That's full-time at World Cup Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
